title: NFC South Preview
itunes:title: NFC South Preview
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal,  Marc Sessler and Kevin Patra – break down the latest NFL news, including Bill’s defensive tackle Marcell Dareus facing a four-game suspension and the Eagles trading for wide receiver Dorial Green-Beckham. Plus, the heroes recap the second episode of “Hard Knocks” and close out the podcast with a preview of the NFC South.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
